document.full_text: the knuckleballer r. a. dickey limited atlanta to one run, but right fielder carlos beltran was forced from the game with a bruised leg.
document.title: mets 6, braves 4: dickey dominates the braves, but beltran's injury gives the mets a scare
lines_and_colors: the knuckleballer r. a. dickey limited atlanta to one run, but right fielder carlos beltran was forced from the game with a bruised leg.
